title: Sand Elemental
summaries: The Sand Elemental is a rare Hardmode enemy which spawns in the Desert during a Sandstorm. She is guaranteed to drop a Forbidden Fragment, the main ingredient for the Forbidden armor as well as the Spirit Flame.

The Sand Elemental attacks by summoning three Ancient Storms randomly around the general location of the player, which last 5 seconds. The distance between them varies, and they remain stationary for their lifespan. The Sand Elemental cannot travel through <linked>blocks</linked>, and flies in a non-linear pattern. She attempts to move towards the player and gets faster as her health depletes.

She is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. The Sand Elemental requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of her <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
